messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/24/2006 6:30:49 PM Eastern Standard Time,
supenn@... writes:
> grocery store to find that Annie's Organic Cheddar Bunny crackers had
> more fat than goldfish crackers...not that fat is the only reason
> you'd make a purchasing choice, but it's a factor I use.
>
> ****I don't think fat is such a bad thing IF it (and mostly everything else
> you eat) comes to you as it was intended = Whole/complete and organic = Not
> processed in any way by man. That's a hard thing to accomplish in this day and
> age, definitely takes more time on our parts. Too bad, man just can't seem
> to help himself when it comes to our food sources, just can't leave well
> enough alone. The things they do to our dairy and meat products are enough to kill
> us all, or at least the ones we will leave behind.
>
> Nancy




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
